message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite comfortable with $105. I can do $108, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $105 again? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can agree on that price.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I think the product's value is worth more than $105. I can do $109, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with $109. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $109. Can we try $107?
I'm willing to listen to your proposal, Bob. However, I think $107 is still a bit low considering the product's value. I can do $112, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with $112. I'm willing to make a final offer of $110. If you can meet me at this price, I'll make a serious commitment to buy the product.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $112, Bob. However, I'm willing to make a compromise. I can meet you at $111, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with $111. I'm going to have to pass on this deal and look elsewhere. I'll consider buying the product from John for $120.
